      • withQueryResults

        public <T> List<T> withQueryResults(String workspaceName,
                                    String statement,
                                    String language,
                                    NodeCallback<T> callback,
                                    long offset,
                                    long limit)
        Specified by:
        withQueryResults in interface JCRAccessor
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type returned by the callback operation.
        Parameters:
        workspaceName - The name of the workspace.
        statement - The query statement.
        language - The query language.
        callback - The callback operation to be performed on each item in the query result.
        offset - The offset in the query result to start processing.
        limit - The maximum number of items to process.
        Returns:
        A List containing the callback results.
        Throws:
        RepositoryAccessException - If there was an error executing the query or processing the results.
